cause.description:
Imagine reaching out and bringing hope to kids who live, work, and play in a world made of trash. Imagine impacting an entire community of people imprisoned by mountains of garbage.
Love Light & Melody is a nonprofit organization is dedicated to battling the physical, emotional, and spiritual affects of extreme poverty in trash dump communities.
We are committed to becoming experts on the life and culture inside the city trash dump in Managua, Nicaragua. Our goal is to identify and meet the immediate physical needs, raise awareness about trash dump communities, and fight social injustice. We use music and the arts to rebuild, restore, and bring healing to communities ravaged by extreme poverty.
Learn more... http://lovelightandmelody.org
Join our Facebook Group: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2302414941
1. Spread awareness of the needs in Managua's city dump.
2. Bring love, light, and melody to the trash dump community.
3. Seek better living arrangements for all people living in the dump.
